    Hello! My name is Patrick.

    As someone who like to try new things, I have gone through a varied but related work through out the years. I have been a software developer, a freelancer, a big-4 financial consultant, and now currently an actuary.

    Although my experiences were rather diverse, they all lead up to this goal:
    helping people and business make better decisions, with data and technology.

    In my free time, I like to learn new languages (currently japanese), do some coding, play some music on my piano and window-shopping for new gadgets and audio gear.

    For more information, you can:

    • see my resume on linkedin. For PDF version (Eng or JP), please let me know.
    • see my blog/projects.
    • or drop me an email. (recaptcha-ed to prevent spam)

    I'm always open to interesting projects and opportunities, so drop me a line!
